=WITH pending_followups AS (
    SELECT 
        f.*,
        gc.messages,
        gc.lead_score,
        gc.language,
        gc.subject,
        gc.message_count,
        CASE 
            WHEN gc.message_count IS NULL OR gc.message_count = 0 THEN 'no_response'
            WHEN gc.lead_score >= 70 THEN 'high_interest'
            WHEN gc.message_count >= 2 THEN 'active_discussion'
            WHEN gc.lead_score >= 50 THEN 'standard'
            ELSE 'low_interest'
        END as followup_type
    FROM {{ $json.table_email_follow_ups }} f
    LEFT JOIN {{ $json.table_gmail_conversations }} gc ON f.thread_id = gc.thread_id
    WHERE f.status = 'pending'
      AND f.follow_up_date <= NOW()
      AND f.follow_up_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
)
SELECT * FROM pending_followups
ORDER BY follow_up_date ASC
LIMIT 20;
